body_html: @zhaopku Hi, me too. When i set x = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, [None, 3] ), i want to loop over the first dimmension of the x. If i use "for i in range(x.get_shape().as_list()[0])", the error is " 'NoneType' object cannot be interpreted as an integer", if " for i in range(tf.shape(x)[0])", error is " 'Tensor' object cannot be interpreted as an integer". Did you find a way to fix this? Thanks.
